title: Mercurius Rusticus, or, The countries complaint of the barbarous outrages committed by the sectaries of this late flourishing kingdom together with a brief chronology of the battels, sieges, conflicts, and other most remarkable passages, from the beginning of this unnatural war, to the 25th of March, 1646.
author: Ryves, Bruno, 1596-1677.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for R. Royston ... and are to be sold by R. Green ...,
